verbs.description: The family of [ARG1: an American graduate student] [V: jailed] [ARGM-LOC: in Vietnam] [ARGM-TMP: a week ago] [ARG2: for his role in an anti - government protest] called on the Trump administration to ask Hanoi officials to resolve his case . Will Nguyen , 32 , of Los Angeles was arrested June 10 .
